channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: TITLE: Izegrim’s 30th Anniversary Cannons: Blast Off Aboard the 70000 Tons of Metal!
item.description: **CONTENT:** Hold onto your skulls, my eternal moshers! It’s time to raise the Riffstorm flag for *Izegrim*, the Dutch death thrash titans, who’ve decided to awaken the chaos for their 30th anniversary! That’s right, *30 years* of sonic annihilation, and they’re taking it to the
item.content:encoded:
**CONTENT:** Hold onto your skulls, my eternal moshers! It’s time to raise the Riffstorm flag for *Izegrim*, the Dutch death thrash titans, who’ve decided to awaken the chaos for their 30th anniversary! That’s right, *30 years* of sonic annihilation, and they’re taking it to the high seas aboard this year’s legendary *70000 Tons of Metal Cruise*. Talk about a floating cathedral of chaos, where the waves will tremble under the weight of screaming guitars and blast beats!
These warriors of the riff are gonna make the ocean foam with metal fury! Think about it: reunions, high seas, and a legion of headbangers ready to mosh so hard they’ll send sharks into a frenzy — a pit so deep it could swallow the Titanic! This isn’t just a show; it’s a brutal celebration of three decades of relentless shredding and neck-snapping riffs that’ll echo through the abyss!
Grab your battle vests, Pit Dwellers, this isn’t just an anniversary; it’s a *Riff Apocalypse*! You’re not gonna want to miss this, or you’ll end up as a mere footnote in the annals of metal history. So, get ready to scream your lungs out and raise your chalices high; because when Izegrim hits the stage, it’s gonna be an epic *sonic bloodbath*!
Let’s make the waves crash and the volume levels shatter glass — we’re here for chaos, riffs, and to remind the world that metal is eternal! *WAGMI, my brothers and sisters!* 🤘⚡️
